theorem strong_topology.locally_convex_space (𝔖 : Set (Set E)) (h𝔖₁ : 𝔖.nonempty) (h𝔖₂ : DirectedOn (· ⊆ ·) 𝔖) :
    @locally_convex_space R («expr →SL[ ] » E σ F) _ _ _ (strongTopology σ F 𝔖) :=
  by
  letI : TopologicalSpace («expr →SL[ ] » E σ F) := strong_topology σ F 𝔖
  haveI : TopologicalAddGroup («expr →SL[ ] » E σ F) := strong_topology.topological_add_group _ _ _
  refine'
    locally_convex_space.of_basis_zero _ _ _ _
      (strong_topology.has_basis_nhds_zero_of_basis _ _ _ h𝔖₁ h𝔖₂ (locally_convex_space.convex_basis_zero R F)) _
  rintro ⟨S, V⟩ ⟨hS, hVmem, hVconvex⟩ f hf g hg a b ha hb hab x hx
  exact hVconvex (hf x hx) (hg x hx) ha hb hab
#align strong_topology.locally_convex_space strong_topology.locally_convex_space
